Class Library

java.lang.Object
Library
public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
The Library class stores a list of Books in an array and provides functions to add, remove, checkout, and return. Other functions include printing list in order by date / serial number. Also there are helper methods that are referenced throughout the Kiosk class.
Author:
Abimanyu Ananthu, Ashish Shenoy

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Book[] books  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Library()
    Creates a Library and starts off with memory to store 4 books.

    • books

      public Book[] books

  • Constructor Details

    • Library

      public Library()
      Creates a Library and starts off with memory to store 4 books.

  • Method Details

    • getNumBooks

      public int getNumBooks()
      A getter method to return the number of books currently within the library.
      Returns:
      number of books in the library

    • add

      public void add​(Book book)
      Method to add a specified book to the library.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book we are adding to the library.

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Book book)
      Method to remove a specified book to the library.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book we are removing to the library.
      Returns:
      returns true if the book is removed, otherwise false in the case the book is not able to be removed because it is not in the library.

    • checkOut

      public boolean checkOut​(Book book)
      Method to check out a specified book to the library.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book we are checking out to the library.
      Returns:
      returns true if the book is has not been checked out, otherwise false in the case it has already been checked out because you cannot check out a checked out book.

    • returns

      public boolean returns​(Book book)
      Method to return a specified book to the library.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book we are returning back to the library.
      Returns:
      returns true if the book is has been checked out, otherwise false in the case it has not been checked out because you cannot check out a book that has been returned.

    • findBook

      public Book findBook​(java.lang.String serialNumber)
      Helper method to find a specified book within the library. This method is used to identify a book that has to be removed, checked out, or returned.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - the serial number of the book is the way to identify the book.
      Returns:
      returns the book if its serial number is found within the library, otherwise returns null.

    • print

      public void print()
      Method to print all the books in the library.

    • printByDate

      public void printByDate()
      Method to print all the books in the library, in ascending date order.

    • printByNumber

      public void printByNumber()
      Method to print all the books in the library, in ascending serial number order.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
